18/**
19 * @fileoverview Base OSAPI binding.
20 * This file was copied from
21 * http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/shindig/trunk/features/src/main/javascript/features/shindig.container/osapi.js
22 * and it's slightly modified for Closure.
23 */
24
25goog.provide('goog.osapi');
26
27
28// Expose osapi from container side.
29var osapi = osapi || {};
30goog.exportSymbol('osapi', osapi);
31
32
33/** @type {Function} */
34osapi.callback;
35
36
37/**
38 * Dispatch a JSON-RPC batch request to services defined in the osapi namespace
39 * @param {Array<Object>} requests an array of rpc requests.
40 */
41goog.osapi.handleGadgetRpcMethod = function(requests) {
42 var responses = new Array(requests.length);
43 var callCount = 0;
44 var callback = osapi.callback;
45 var dummy = function(params, apiCallback) {
46 apiCallback({});
47 };
48 for (var i = 0; i < requests.length; i++) {
49 // Don't allow underscores in any part of the method name as a
50 // convention for restricted methods
51 var current = osapi;
52 if (requests[i]['method'].indexOf('_') == -1) {
53 var path = requests[i]['method'].split('.');
54 for (var j = 0; j < path.length; j++) {
55 if (current.hasOwnProperty(path[j])) {
56 current = current[path[j]];
57 } else {
58 // No matching api
59 current = dummy;
60 break;
61 }
62 }
63 } else {
64 current = dummy;
65 }
66
67 // Execute the call and latch the rpc callback until all
68 // complete
69 current(requests[i]['params'], function(i) {
70 return function(response) {
71 // Put back in json-rpc format
72 responses[i] = {'id': requests[i].id, 'data': response};
73 callCount++;
74 if (callCount == requests.length) {
75 callback(responses);
76 }
77 };
78 }(i));
79 }
80};
81
82
83/**
84 * Initializes container side osapi binding.
85 */
86goog.osapi.init = function() {
87 // Container-side binding for the gadgetsrpctransport used by osapi.
88 // Containers add services to the client-side osapi implementation by
89 // defining them in the osapi namespace
90 if (gadgets && gadgets.rpc) { // Only define if gadgets rpc exists.
91 // Register the osapi RPC dispatcher.
92 gadgets.rpc.register('osapi._handleGadgetRpcMethod',
93 /** @type {!Function} */ (goog.osapi.handleGadgetRpcMethod));
94 }
95};
